# Streams implementation details

> Documentation for Streams implementation details.

- [Azure Queue streams overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/implementation/streams-implementation/azure-queue-streams.md): Explore the streaming implementation with Azure Queue in .NET Orleans.
- [Streams implementation details](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/implementation/streams-implementation/index.md): Learn the stream implementation details in .NET Orleans.
